CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. A13 reads: "Magic Surrounds Girl Friends' Pittsburgh Meet - New Officers for the coming year, seated :Alyce Moore, Roanoke; Vera Riddick, Boston, Mass.; Kay MacCampbell. Standing: Henri Youngue, New York; Margarite Gibbs, New Haven, Conn., and Montrose Hilton, Philly."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of six new officers of the Girl Friends, Inc., seated: Alyce Moore, Vera Riddick, and Kay MacCampbell; standing: Henri Youngue, Margarite Gibbs, and Montrose Hilton, posed in Webster Hall with landscape mural for Thirtieth Anniversary Convention of Girl Friends, Inc.
